kyle: when i think about you life is not as bad gas prices aint as high and sad movies are not as sad i pray to god i never break your heart and end up like my dad i dont think he ever planned to fail he just failed to plan so i dont use the calendar its not in my genetics though nolan coles on his iphone so i dont sweat it yo customized by living a life of never having shit so i just learned the dance and rapping shit to go and get it yo g-easy was easy to sing like r kelly on an empty belly like helen keller aint nobody can tell me nothing i knew my shit was slappin i knew my bass was bumpin i used to sound like drake dude tell me who fucking doesnt but i was 13 so fuck it oh well im 23 and now im trying to be as cool as pharrell like for real whos gon be on top you never can tell got homies on the block who went from deebo to ezal ha i told them id rather be craig make music make money instead its funny how the things keeping me fed bought me a bed all came from my head
